name: Kinetics
description:
In this game you control a cube with telekinesis to help the player reach the next level.

This game is in alpha state, these are some mechanics added to the game and that will be added:

Cube Control

Double jump

Fight (Not added)

Lasers (Not added)

Enemies (Not added)

Lava

And many more

NOTE: Im not an expert, I started in game developent 2 weeks ago (27/10/21) and maybe there will be errors in the next updates or maybe the game has some delay with the updates, take in mind that it is in alpha state
